Others: LeBron James achieved his fourth consecutive triple-double with 15 points, 16 rebounds, and 12 assists.
James complimented the San Antonio Spurs for their performance and maintaining composure.
James acknowledged his diminished role in the offense but emphasized his ability to take over games when needed.
James credited his individual success to his teammates for being good shooters.
After the game, James spent time with San Antonio Spurs rookie Stephon Castle, discussing reads and future steps.
